cvrfdoc.document_title: Red Hat Security Advisory: Updated tcsh packages are now available for Red Hat Linux.
cvrfdoc.document_distribution: Copyright Â© 2021 Red Hat, Inc. All rights reserved.

remediation.description:
For each RPM for your particular architecture, run:
rpm -Fvh [filename]
where filename is the name of the RPM.

note: Updated tcsh packages are now available for Red Hat Linux 5.2, 6.x, and 7.

Versions 6.09 and below of tcsh are vulnerable to a symbolic link attack. 
This attack can be used to cause users to destroy the contents of any file
to which they have write access.
